member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.Controls.AutoCompletingMaskEventArgs
member.summary: Provides information on input text whose mask is being automatically completed.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.Controls.AutoSelectTextBox
member.summary: Represents a text box whose content is selected when it receives the focus as well as performs automatic focus navigation when the caret reaches the extremities of the text range.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.Controls.CalendarItem
member.summary: Represents an item (day) in the DatePicker's calendar.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.Controls.CheckBox
member.summary: Represents a control used to edit and display boolean values. This class should be used rather than the system provided CheckBox control which causes issues with focus when used within a focus scope (e.g., DataGridControl).

summary.para: Represents an element which filters input that is not numerical.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.Controls.DateLayoutPanel
member.summary: Represents a panel that can be used to layout the date components.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.Controls.DatePicker
member.summary: Represents a control used to edit and display dates.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.Controls.DatePickerCommands
member.summary: Provides a set of commands that can be used to change the selected and displayed dates in the DatePicker control.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.Controls.DateTimeTextBox
member.summary: Represents a control that limits the value extracted from the inputted text to be a DateTime value.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.Controls.Licenser
member.summary: Class that registers the classes defined in the Xceed.Wpf.Controls assembly.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.Controls.MaskedTextBox
member.summary: Represents a control that limits the inputted text to be of the format determined by the specified mask.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.Controls.NavigableComboBox
member.summary: Represents a combo box control that supports navigation within its drop-down section.

summary.para: Represents an element which filters input that is not numerical. The NumericInputscope class will prevent modifications from being applied until the focus is removed from the scope.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.Controls.NumericTextBox
member.summary: Represents a control that limits the value extracted from the inputted text to be a numeric value.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.Controls.QueryMoveFocusEventArgs
member.summary: Provides information on the focus navigation.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.Controls.QueryTextFromValueEventArgs
member.summary: Provides information about the value and text being queried when an attempt is made to convert the specified value into its string representation.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.Controls.QueryValueFromTextEventArgs
member.summary: Provides information about the text and value being queried when an attempt is made to extract a value from the specified text.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.Controls.TextBlockLite
member.summary: Represents a simpler and more performant version of a TextBlock.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.Controls.ValueRangeTextBox
member.summary: Represents a control that limits the value extracted from the inputted text to be within the bounds determined by the MinValue and MaxValue properties.

member.name: M:Xceed.Wpf.Controls.AutoCompletingMaskEventArgs.#ctor(System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)

A value indicating the number of selected characters.

member.name: M:Xceed.Wpf.Controls.MaskedTextBox.CreateMaskedTextProvider(System.String,System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.Boolean,System.Char,System.Char,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates the masked-text provider that will be used by the masked text box specifying various settings.

param.name: mask
param.para: The string that will be used as the input mask.

param.name: cultureInfo
param.para: The CultureInfo that will be used by the masked-text provider.

member.param: true if the prompt char should be considered as a valid input character; false, otherwise. By default, true.
A character that represents the positions in the masked text box that require input. By default, "_"­ (underscore).
A character that represents the character to used to mask a password.
true if non-ASCII characters are accepted; false otherwise. By default, false.

member.name: M:Xceed.Wpf.Controls.MaskedTextBox.GetFormatSpecifierFromMask(System.String,System.IFormatProvider)
member.summary: Retrieves a format specifier from the specified mask and format provider.
member.param: The mask from which the format specifier is to be extracted.
An IFormatProvider that will be used to extract the appropriate symbols for any numeric mask characters contained in the mask.

member.summary: Queries the specified text and returns its corresponding value converted to the type specified by the ValueDataType property and according to the format defined by the FormatProvider property.

member.name: M:Xceed.Wpf.Controls.ValueRangeTextBox.ValidateValue(System.Object)
member.summary: Validates the specified value to ensure that it is of the type specified by the ValueDataType property and that it is greater than or equal to MinValue and less than or equal to MaxValue.
member.exception: An attempt was made to set a value when the ValueDataType property is null.The value if not of the type defined by the ValueDataType property.The specified value must be greater than or equal to MinValue and less than or equal to MaxValue.
member.param: The value to validate.
